column4: Have you tried /dev/sda1? I have a jumpdrive and that's where it's mounted.

libusb, I think. I know hotplug manages it. carthikSchool.

Warty.

*Hoary
Runs mainly okay at the moment.
I was under the impression Hoary was only test phase and live CD. Not officially released.
it's on the official servers, makes it official to me ;-)
The only problem i have with it is Evolution not working (at all) but that seems to be aHoary problem, not an amd64 problem.

official. Just not reelase.
